ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is freeing someone's neck from slavery;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is the setting free of a slave
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (It is) the setting free of a slave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is the freeing of a slave;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [It is] the freeing of a slave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (It is) the freeing of a slave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is the freeing of a slave
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:13] the freeing of a slave, from bondage,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 756 ((It is) to free a slave) He says: its crossing requires the freeing of a slave; and it is also said this means: none will cross it save he who has freed a slave,
